page.title: 13SHOPS IN THE AREA
page.content:
{SHOPS IN THE AREA}
There are few shops in Trefonen village.There is one post office which sells food,sweets and newspapers.Mrs Ellis is the owner of the post office. She has been the owner for a long time.There is one other post office in Treflach they also sell food,sweets,newspapers and comics.The other shop in Trefonen is called Martin's stores it's like a mini_supermarket and sells most things.The shop is owned by Mr Martin who also has a larger cash and carry warehouse in the village.The village also has a well known shoe repair shop,people coming from Oswestry to get their shoes repaired.In Trefonen there is a pottery run by Mrs F Cripps.She makes a variety of things and sells them in Oswestry.
